title: Award of Construction Work of the University College proposed to be Established in Batangala in Dehiowita Divisional Secretariat Division, Kegalle District to the State Engineering Corporation
decision_details: - the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Skills Development has made arrangements to establish 25 University Colleges affiliated to the University of Vocational Technology and the State Engineering Corporation has already undertaken the construction of buildings for University Colleges in Kuliyapitiya, Katubedda, Ratmalana, Matara, Jaffna and Anuradhapura.  The proposal made by Hon. Dullas Alahapperuma, Minister of Youth Affairs and Skills Development, to proceed with the project for the construction of the University College proposed to be established in the Kegalle District to coincide with the “Deyata Kirula” Development Programme - 2014, in Batangala in the Dehiowita Divisional Secretariat Division, was approved by the Cabinet.
